name: Docker Build and Push

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main   # Или твојата главна грана

jobs:
  build-and-push:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Log in to DockerHub
        uses: docker/login-action@v2
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }}

      - name: Build and push backend image
        run: |
          docker build -t yourdockerhubusername/backend:latest ./backend
          docker push yourdockerhubusername/backend:latest

      - name: Build and push frontend image
        run: |
          docker build -t yourdockerhubusername/frontend:latest ./frontend
          docker push yourdockerhubusername/frontend:latest

      - name: Build and push mongo image (optional if customized)
        run: |
          docker pull mongo:latest
          docker tag mongo:latest yourdockerhubusername/mongo:latest
          docker push yourdockerhubusername/mongo:latest
